properties.areaDesc: S of Currituck Beach Light NC to Oregon Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 3 at 3:00AM EST until January 4 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...GUSTY WINDS AND HAZARDOUS SEAS DEVELOPING TODAY AND CONTINUING
INTO THIS WEEKEND...

.A strong cold front will approach the region Friday night and
pass through Saturday. Southwest winds will increase to 20 to
30 knots today over the coastal waters, becoming west to
northwest and increasing to 30 to 40 knots behind the front
Saturday night into Sunday morning.

* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25
kt expected. For the Gale Watch, northwest winds 20 to 30 kt
with gusts up to 40 kt and seas 5 to 8 feet possible.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Duck to Oregon Inlet.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 8 AM this morning to
2 AM EST Saturday. For the Gale Watch, from Saturday evening
through Sunday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 AM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
